metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13881 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In support.c in pam_tacplus 1.3.8 through 1.5.1, the TACACS+ shared secret gets logged via syslog if the DEBUG loglevel and journald are used.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-tacplus - 1.3.8-2+deb8u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpam-tacplus package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.8-2+deb8u1build0.18.04.1').
